title: Chettinad Chicken
ingredients: ['1kg skinless, boneless chicken breast, cut into bite-sized chunks', '1 teaspoon turmeric', 'salt to taste', '4 tablespoons vegetable oil', '2 teaspoons poppy seeds', '2 teaspoons whole black peppercorns', '2 teaspoons fennel seed', '2 teaspoons coriander seed', '1 teaspoon cumin seed', '3 large onions, minced', '4 green chillies, chopped', '2 sprigs fresh curry leaves', '1 tablespoon ginger paste', '1 teaspoon garlic paste', '250g chopped fresh tomatoes', '120ml water']
